poem.title: Bomb
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The onomatopoeia Met the patented device Around 1900, when both were about 50. RNA, RNA : zip, hook, unzip.
Took off with the order of bomber jackets For US aviation. Zippo lighter Zoning Improvement Program Unpack a coca logo file On the zip code of Cambodia A baw hair caught in the fly of Henry's Levis On that great big Harley in the sky.
